name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior OPS Engineer with over 10 years of experience in delivering high-performance solutions in healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Linux**, **Ansible**, **Terraform**, **GitLab CI/CD**, **ArgoCD**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Infrastructure as Code**. Strong expertise in **networking** and **security concepts**, with a solid background in managing **distributed systems** to ensure secure and efficient operations. Proven ability to build and maintain CI/CD pipelines, automate deployment processes, and monitor system performance. Skilled in modern programming technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, and leading development projects that integrate AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics and intelligent decision-making. Committed to creating secure, maintainable solutions that comply with industry standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Fluent in German and English, with a passion for building systems that create meaningful real-world impact.
